forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun graces the city, offering a luminous spectacle under clear blue skies. There's a gentle breeze dancing through the streets, reminiscent of whispers between friends, making temperatures hover around a comfortable 62 degrees. The visibility is splendid, allowing glimpses of far-off landmarks, yet there is a modest presence of fog creeping in from the bay, subtly veiling parts of the coastline. This transient marine layer drapes softly but is unlikely to obscure the warmth of the sun that thrives above, ensuring an inviting atmosphere for outdoor pursuits.

As evening approaches, expect the skies to transition into a partly cloudy canvas, inviting a cooler embrace with temperatures dipping into the lower 50s. Dressing in layers will serve you well; consider light, breathable fabrics coupled with a cozy jacket for when the wind picks up later in the evening. These conditions are perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps stopping for a quiet moment at a café that overlooks the bay, or enjoying the city’s vibrant culture at a local gallery. With the light playing off the architecture and the soundtrack of the city surrounding you, this may just be one of those afternoons that clings to memory, a fleeting yet beautiful expression of life in this ever-enigmatic city by the sea.
